name: Order Up (Mark Emanuele)
description: In the last five years, your galaxy was on the verge of a cataclysmic event. A ship was built just in time before your planet could be sucked into the void and fled with the survivors. You were lucky enough to win a ticket thanks to the government's 'lottery' tickets. However, the lottery only allowed you on board. In order to continue to eat, sleep and live you are forced to work at the 'Comet King' fast food restaurant. The work is endless and one slip will get yourself fired and shunted out the airlock.
